Title: Relates to multiple violations of the highway construction or maintenance work area photo speed violation monitoring system
Summary: Suspends the registration of vehicles which have been documented multiple times by a photo speed violation monitoring system for speeding in a highway construction or maintenance work area.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to suspending the registration of vehicles which have been documented multiple times by a photo speed violation monitoring system for speeding in a highway construction or maintenance work area
